title: O GOD OUR HELP IN AGES PAST

sections.title: Verse 1
content: O God, our help in ages past,
Our hope for years to come,
Our shelter from the stormy blast,

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Before the hills in order stood,

sections.title: Verse 3
content: A thousand ages in Thy sight
Short as the watch that ends the night

sections.title: Verse 4
content: They fly forgotten, as a dream
